properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 10 at 6:06AM EST until February 10 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Wakefield VA
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in
Virginia...North Carolina..

Appomattox River At Mattoax affecting Amelia...Chesterfield and
Powhatan Counties

Cashie River Near Windsor affecting Bertie County


For the Appomattox Basin...including Mattoax...Minor flooding is
forecast.For the Lower Roanoke Basin...including Windsor...Minor
flooding is occurring and is expected to continue.

The Flood Warning continues for...
The Cashie River Near Windsor
* until this afternoon...or until the warning is cancelled.
* At 05:15 AM Monday the stage was 8.1 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring.
* Flood stage is 8.0 feet.
* Forecast...The river will fall before rising again to a secondary
crest near 7.9 feet by Thursday early afternoon. The river will
fall below flood stage late this morning.
* Forecast...The river will continue to fall to below flood stage by
late this morning.
* At 8.0 feet...Portions of N. York St, Davis Ball Park and the
Cashie Wetlands Walk begin to flood.
This river level is comparable to a previous crest of 8.1 feet on Feb
26 2016.
